EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Spring XD: A Platform for data at scale and developer producti
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring XD: A Platform for data at scale and developer productivity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring XD: A Platform for data at scale and developer productivity with Sabby Anandan, Mark Pollack and Mark Fisher. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, February 17, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=ea3bcacba982f4fe7d617a83a2cd2cc2c>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 666 052 729
Thank you,
